content.content: Just touched down in NYC. The skyline's breathtaking, but I already miss Kyoto's peace. Off to hunt for a new ramen spot to claim as my own. 🗽🍜
content.raw_content: Just landed in NYC. The skyline's incredible, but I miss the quiet temples of Kyoto already. Time to find a new ramen spot to call home. 🗽🍜 #NYC #NewBeginnings
